page.title: 12Huntington.Future Hopes.
page.content:
Interviews....Present to Future.
The people we interviewed all said that they did not want any more factories built in Huntington. Everyone said that there were no places for recreation, so in the future there should be places for both young people and old people to meet. There are shortages of certain shops, only one chemist, one bank and two post offices. There are no sports facilities at all, and the Yearsley swimming bath is old and costly to run. The river needs to be cleaned up and footpaths along the river should be built so that people can walk there.
